wiki.name: Plan to incorporate DI in your teaching!
wiki.intro:
Wrap up our work on differentiating instruction by refining your teaching goals. Finish this statement. Hint: Copy the frame and the paste into the editing window so all you have to do is fill in the details. Don't forget to sign your entry.

In my teaching, I plan to incorporate the DI principles of _______________ and _________________. I will do this by __________________________. I will monitor my progress on this goal by _____________________.

Here is an example:

In my teaching, I plan to incorporate the DI principles of varying the content and process. I will do this by providing multiple kinds of materials for the students to learn the content (books, articles, video, audio) and will incorporate more group work to vary the processes students use to learn the material.I will monitor my progress on this goal by keeping a journal of the specific practices I use and the results of each (e.g., student responses and successes/challenges), and I will use the results to modify my practice.
